Work hazards
If you work with chemicals, 
lead or X-rays, or are in a job 
with a lot of lifting, you may 
be risking your health and 
the health of your baby. If you 
have any worries about this, 
you should talk to your doctor, 
midwife, occupational health 
nurse, union representative or 
personnel department.
